name: artists_get_top_songs
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool shazam.
Tool description: Identify any song. Discover, artists, lyrics, videos & playlists to create a song detector site/application such as shazam.com
API description: Fetches the top songs of a specified artist using the Shazam API.

is_id.description:
The value of 'artist->adamid' field returned in .../search OR .../songs/v2/detect OR .../songs/get-details endpoint
The value of 'artists->id' field returned in .../shazam-songs/get-details OR .../albums/get-details OR .../albums/get-related-artist

l.description: The language code for the response. Defaults to 'en-US'.
